Description.Name: Lucy Meyer
Description.Details: Lucy Meyer, callsign "Temptress", is a veteran MechWarrior with a shadowed past. Once a lethal assassin in service to House Liao, she navigated the treacherous world of covert operations with deadly grace. Gifted with a mesmerizing allure and a silver tongue, she could charm her way into any target's confidence before striking them down in cold precision. However, a harrowing revelation shook her conscience, leading her to abandon her life as an assassin and seek redemption. Embracing the path of a mercenary, Lucy now wages her skills on the battlefield, fighting for just causes and seeking to balance the scales of karma.
